EmailTemplate.name: Referral from Marielena Salazar - Turbonomic Intro (1494935103.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Referral from Marielena Salazar - Turbonomic Intro (1494935103.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jorge, I was sent your direction after briefly speaking with Marielena Salazar about who it would be best to speak with when it comes to virtualization optimization for the Miami-Dade County, FL team. From my research I know you and the team have invested a large sum in VMware’s hypervisor and that you are looking to continue to virtualize the infrastructure more towards the end of 2017/beginning of 2018. I was hoping that we could show you why other counties/cities like City of Miami have chosen to implement Turbonomic into their infrastructure, enabling them to increase application performance while also increasing their infrastructure efficiency. I also wanted to make sure you and the team were aware that for the month of May Turbonomic is offering $15,000 off if a team chooses to go through an evaluation during the month of May. Do you have 30 minutes for my team and I to provide an introduction to you and the team over the next couple of weeks? Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]> Going to Cisco Live? Meet with a Turbonomic Executive <[[https://turbonomic.com/leadership-meetings]]>
